Container.Name: Privoxy
Container.Description:
Privoxy is a non-caching web proxy with advanced filtering capabilities for enhancing privacy, modifying web page data and HTTP headers, controlling access, and removing ads and other obnoxious Internet junk.[br][br]
Once the container is started, update your computer's proxy settings to use your unRAID server, port 8118 (or whatever you configured the port to be).[br][br]
Point your web browser to [url]http://config.privoxy.org/show-status[/url] to check Privoxy status.[br][br]
[b]Note that this container does not save any changes you make. So don't bother configuring it.[/b][br][br]
[b]Note that if your unRAID server is down, your internet won't work because the proxy won't be running.[/b][br][br]
Note that I didn't create this Docker image. I'm just creating a template for unRAID.
Container.Overview: Privoxy is a non-caching web proxy with advanced filtering capabilities for enhancing privacy, modifying web page data and HTTP headers, controlling access, and removing ads and other obnoxious Internet junk.
